backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, game CRUD operations with creator-based authorization, and access control using mixins for storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: chat close/exit button, multi-chat navigation, and ChatSidebar session display with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, and configuration files describing their functionality and implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, and component colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with comprehensive SEO meta tags, Open Graph tags, Twitter Card tags, PWA manifest, canonical URL, and JSON-LD structured data for Nexora AI platform.
frontend/public/demo.html: Standalone interactive demo page with dark theme styling, tabbed navigation, and embedded styles using OKLCH color variables for showcasing Neroxa AI features.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining Neroxa AI app metadata, icons, display mode, theme colors, and orientation for progressive web app installation.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt file allowing all user agents to crawl all paths on the site.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing all main application routes with priorities and change frequencies for search engine indexing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application entry point that sets up React Query, TanStack Router with routes for chat, math, media, translator, music, art, code, games, and shared content, wrapped in ThemeProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/components/ArtCanvas.tsx: Interactive drawing canvas component with color palette, brush size controls, eraser tool, AI art idea generator chat, and artwork save/share functionality with URL generation.
frontend/src/components/ChatPage.tsx: Chat page container that manages sidebar collapse state and routing between chat sessions, displaying either a selected chat or a welcome screen.
frontend/src/components/ChatSidebar.tsx: Collapsible sidebar displaying chat session list with timestamps, new chat button, and session selection handling with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/ChatView.tsx: Chat interface component showing message history with user/assistant avatars, textarea input with send button, typing indicator, and auto-scrolling message list.
frontend/src/components/DictionaryView.t: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary class component that catches errors, displays a styled error card with details and retry/reload buttons, and provides optional custom fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/GameBrowser.tsx: Displays a searchable, filterable list of all games with tabs for all/user/AI-created games, showing game cards in a grid and allowing owners to delete their games. Opens GamePlayer modal when a game is selected.
frontend/src/components/GameCard.tsx: Renders a single game card with thumbnail, title, description, creator badge (AI/User), and a play button that triggers the onPlay callback.
frontend/src/components/GameModeModal.ts: Modal dialog that presents three options: play built-in games, browse community games, or create a new game, each with an icon and button.
frontend/src/components/GamePlayer.tsx: Loads and renders games in an iframe with fullscreen support, tracks high scores, and includes built-in game templates (Flappy Bird, Snake, Pong, Breakout). Posts game scores to parent window and updates high scores on the backend.
frontend/src/components/GameStudio.tsx: Provides a form for authenticated users to create games by entering title, description, and HTML/CSS/JavaScript code, then saves to backend and navigates to game browser.
frontend/src/components/GamesView.tsx: Displays a paginated, searchable, filterable catalogue of games with 24 items per page, supporting all/user/AI filters and opening GamePlayer when a game is selected.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar showing the Neroxa AI logo, theme toggle button, user profile name (when authenticated), and sign-out button with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/MathProblemSolve: React component for solving math problems with step-by-step explanations, difficulty levels (K-2 through 11-12), teacher mode for concept explanations, and a homework helper chat interface.
frontend/src/components/MediaDisplay.tsx: React component with tabbed interface for generating AI images and videos from text prompts, displaying generated media in a grid, and showing upload progress.
frontend/src/components/MusicGenerator.t: React component for generating music via AI prompts or creating beat patterns with a visual sequencer, includes playback controls, tempo slider, and music sharing functionality.
frontend/src/components/PredefinedGameSe: Dialog component displaying a grid of predefined classic games (Flappy Bird, Snake, Pong, Breakout) with cards for instant game selection.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup, collecting user name and initializing game stats (gamesPlayed, totalScore) with form validation.
frontend/src/components/Scripter.tsx: Chat-style interface for generating code snippets from natural language descriptions, with message history, copy-to-clipboard functionality, and keyboard shortcuts.
frontend/src/components/SharedContentVie: React component that displays shared artwork or music content by ID, fetching from backend hooks and showing loading/error states with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/components/TranslatorChat.t: Translation chat interface component with language selection dropdowns, message history display, and input area for translating text between 10 supported languages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtIdeaGenerator.t: Hook that generates art prompt suggestions based on user input keywords (animals, landscapes, abstract, portraits, fantasy, space, flowers, food), returning randomized creative ideas for each category.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtworkShare.ts: Hook for sharing artwork by generating local artwork IDs and providing URL copy functionality; backend sharing support has been removed.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioGeneration.ts: Hook that generates synthetic audio using Web Audio API, creating simple melodies based on prompt characteristics and converting AudioBuffer to WAV blobs for playback and storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanvasDrawing.ts: Hook managing HTML canvas drawing state and operations including mouse/touch drawing, color/brush size control, eraser mode, and canvas clearing with coordinate scaling for responsive canvases.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatSessions.ts: Manages chat sessions using localStorage instead of backend, providing queries and mutations for loading sessions, adding messages, and creating new sessions with bigint timestamp handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameCatalogue.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching game catalogue data, individual game metadata, categories, and games by category from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGames.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on games (get all, get single, create, delete) using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameState.ts: Manages game high scores using localStorage with React Query hooks for retrieving and updating high scores per game ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication with React context, providing login/logout functionality, identity management, and status tracking using DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaGeneration.ts: Simulates AI image and video generation by creating placeholder media with canvas, managing generated media state and loading indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useMusicShare.ts: Provides music sharing functionality that generates local music IDs and share URLs, though backend persistence is no longer supported.
frontend/src/hooks/useScriptGeneration.t: Simulates AI script generation for various programming languages and use cases, managing conversation history with mock code generation based on user requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useSharedContent.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching shared artwork and music, but both features throw errors as backend support has been removed.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: Custom React hook that manages translation state and provides mock translation functionality with support for common greetings and thanks phrases across 12 languages.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving user profiles via an actor backend, with toast notifications and automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens defining a dark theme with teal primary colors, coral accents, and sidebar styling using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name composition.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/templates/flappyBirdTemplat: Complete HTML template string for a Flappy Bird game with canvas rendering, sprite images, collision detection, and scoring system.
frontend/src/utils/errorLogger.ts: Error logging utility class that maintains a circular buffer of log entries with severity levels and provides console output methods.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter utilities for extracting query parameters from both regular and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH colors, animations, shadows, and design tokens for a dark-themed UI.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking implemented features for chat navigation and exit functionality, with schema version 1.0.0 and project state version 3.
